Info.Description:
Shop File (Variant 1) Modifies files for the in-game shop.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] All weapons are unlocked when player arrives in Banapur. [*] Unlocks the signature assault rifle ACE (signature variant of the A52) which was removed in the vanilla game. [*] Unlocks all available attachments for all weapons. Weapon slots are modded in a separate package. [*] The sticky explosives and the Guns for hire token upgrades still require the 'Black Market' skill to unlock. [/list]
Modded by JRavens. I have only packed it in the package format.
